show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Join Mickey Huff﻿ and Peter Phillips﻿ for their special Independence Day After program as they move beyond the flag… waving, jingoistic nationalism and discuss a patriotism for the people, the impact of money on democracy in the US, and much more with former CA Green Party gubernatorial candidate Laura Wells﻿ and Prof.
Robert McChesney (author most recently w John Nichols of “Dollarocracy: How the Money and Media Election Complex is Destroying America”).
